nodes.name: Execute Workflow Trigger
nodes.notes: Triggered by WF90 (Job Runner) with req/ctx containing job payload

nodes.name: Set — Normalize Input
nodes.notes: Extract req/ctx from trigger. Preserve all input fields. Input: trigger item. Output: req.* + ctx.*. WHY includeOtherFields=false: clean namespace for downstream

nodes.name: Crypto — Generate Correlation ID
nodes.notes: Generate UUID v4 for correlation_id if missing. Input: req/ctx. Output: generated_correlation_id. WHY: ensures every execution has traceable correlation_id

nodes.name: Set — Build CTX
nodes.notes: Build canonical ctx with correlation_id (generated or from input). Input: normalized req + generated UUID. Output: ctx.* + req.*. WHY includeOtherFields=false: clean structure

nodes.name: IF — Input Guard
nodes.notes: Validate required inputs: tenant_id, document_id, and either storage_url OR blob_object_id. TRUE=valid. FALSE=invalid. Input: ctx + req. Output: same. WHY version=3: n8n v2.6.3 IF schema

nodes.name: ERR — Source Input Guard
nodes.notes: Capture error source metadata for Input Guard failure. Input: failed guard item. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + original. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve failure data

assignments.name: error_context.message
assignments.value: Missing required input: tenant_id, document_id, or storage locator

nodes.name: ERR — Prepare ErrorPipe v1 (Input)
nodes.notes: Build error_context for WF99 (validation failure). Input: err source. Output: error_context.*. WHY includeOtherFields=false: clean error envelope

nodes.name: Execute WF99 (Input)
nodes.notes: Call WF99 Global ERR Handler for input validation failure. Input: error_context. Output: ErrorEnvelope. WHY: centralized error logging per ErrorPipe v1

nodes.name: DB — Select Document
nodes.notes: Load target document row from content.documents by document_id + tenant_id. Input: ctx + req. Output: db.document.*. WHY AOD=OFF: error output required. WHY select op: no arbitrary SQL

nodes.name: Merge — Restore CTX after DB Select
nodes.notes: Restore ctx/req after DB Select Document (Carry pattern C1). Input1: DB result, Input2: ctx/req from Set Build CTX. Output: db.document.* + ctx + req. WHY: Postgres overwrites item

nodes.name: ERR — Source DB Document
nodes.notes: Capture error source for DB Select Document failure (404 or DB error). Input: error output. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + error. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve error details

nodes.name: ERR — Prepare ErrorPipe v1 (DB Doc)
nodes.notes: Build error_context for DB Document failure (404=business, else db error). Input: err source. Output: error_context.*. WHY includeOtherFields=false: clean envelope

nodes.name: Execute WF99 (DB Doc)
nodes.notes: Call WF99 for DB Document failure. Input: error_context. Output: ErrorEnvelope. WHY: ErrorPipe v1 pattern for centralized logging

nodes.name: IF — Has Storage URL
nodes.notes: Check if storage_url provided (skip blob_objects lookup). TRUE=use storage_url. FALSE=query blob_objects. Input: ctx + req + db.document. Output: same. WHY: optimize DB queries

nodes.name: DB — Select Blob Object
nodes.notes: Load blob_object if blob_object_id provided (no storage_url). Input: req (blob_object_id). Output: db.blob.*. WHY: get storage_key/storage_kind for S3. WHY AOD=OFF: error output

nodes.name: Merge — Restore CTX after Blob
nodes.notes: Restore ctx/req after DB Select Blob (Carry C1). Input1: DB blob, Input2: ctx from IF. Output: db.blob.* + ctx + req + db.document.*. WHY: preserve context through DB I/O

nodes.name: ERR — Source DB Blob
nodes.notes: Capture error source for DB Blob lookup (404 or DB error). Input: error output. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + error. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve DB error

nodes.name: ERR — Prepare ErrorPipe v1 (DB Blob)
nodes.notes: Build error_context for Blob lookup failure. Input: err source. Output: error_context.*. WHY includeOtherFields=false: clean envelope for WF99

nodes.name: Execute WF99 (DB Blob)
nodes.notes: Call WF99 for Blob lookup failure. Input: error_context. Output: ErrorEnvelope. WHY: ErrorPipe v1 centralized error logging

nodes.name: Merge — Join Storage Paths
nodes.notes: Join TRUE (has storage_url) and FALSE (blob loaded) branches. Input1: storage_url path, Input2: blob path. Output: unified item with storage locator. WHY mode=append: combine both branches

nodes.name: Set — Prepare S3 Locator
nodes.notes: Build S3 bucket/key from storage_url or blob row. Extract mime_type. Input: merged storage paths. Output: s3.bucket, s3.key, mime_type, ctx, req. WHY includeOtherFields=false: clean

nodes.name: Set — Determine Media Kind
nodes.notes: Infer media_kind from hint or mime_type (image/video/audio). Input: s3 locator + mime_type. Output: media_kind + s3.* + ctx + req. WHY: route to correct AI node

nodes.name: S3 — Download Media
nodes.notes: Download binary from S3 using bucket/key. Input: s3.bucket, s3.key. Output: binary data. WHY retryOnFail: transient S3 errors. WHY AOD=OFF: error output for ErrorPipe

nodes.name: Merge — Restore CTX after S3
nodes.notes: Restore ctx/req/media_kind after S3 Download (Carry C1). Input1: S3 binary, Input2: ctx from Determine Media. Output: binary + media_kind + ctx + req. WHY: S3 overwrites item

nodes.name: ERR — Source S3
nodes.notes: Capture error source for S3 download failure. Input: S3 error output. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + error. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve S3 error details

parameters.text:
You are a strict JSON generator. Output ONLY one valid JSON OBJECT.
Do NOT wrap the JSON in quotes. Do NOT use markdown/code fences.
The first character must be { and the last character must be }
Analyze the image and return ONLY this JSON object with exactly these keys:
{"description":"...","transcription":"...","language":"..."}
Rules:
No extra keys, no comments.
description: a detailed description of what is shown in the image, avoid using the " character inside the text (use ' or curly quotes “ ” if needed).
transcription: verbatim text in windows encoding, if present in the image; if no text, ""
language: a language of a text, if present in the image, ISO 639-1 code when possible, else "und"

nodes.name: AI — Analyze Image
nodes.notes: Gemini analyze image: extract description + OCR text. Input: binary image. Output: ai.image.text. WHY model=gemini-2.5-flash: fast/accurate. WHY AOD=OFF: error output

nodes.name: ERR — Source AI Image
nodes.notes: Capture error source for AI Image analysis failure. Input: AI error. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + error. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve AI error details

parameters.text:
You are a strict JSON generator. Output ONLY one valid JSON OBJECT.
Do NOT wrap the JSON in quotes. Do NOT use markdown/code fences.
The first character must be { and the last character must be }
Analyze the video and return ONLY this JSON object with exactly these keys:
{"description":"...","transcription":"...","language":"..."}
Rules:
No extra keys, no comments.
description: a detailed description of what happens in the video, avoid using the " character inside the text (use ' or curly quotes “ ” if needed).
transcription: verbatim speech in windows encoding; if no speech, ""
language: ISO 639-1 code when possible, else "und"

nodes.name: AI — Analyze Video
nodes.notes: Gemini analyze video: describe scenes/actions/text. Input: binary video. Output: ai.video.text. WHY model=gemini-2.5-flash: video support. WHY AOD=OFF: error output

nodes.name: ERR — Source AI Video
nodes.notes: Capture error source for AI Video analysis failure. Input: AI error. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + error. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve error

nodes.name: ERR — Source AI Transcribe
nodes.notes: Capture error source for AI Transcribe failure. Input: AI error. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + error. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve error

nodes.name: Merge — Join All AI Branches
nodes.notes: Merge image/video/audio analysis results into single stream. Input1: image AI, Input2: video AI, Input3: audio AI. Output: ai.* + ctx + req + media_kind. WHY numberInputs=3: 3 branches

nodes.name: Set — Parse AI Results
nodes.notes: Extract description_text, transcript_text (if audio), build analysis_meta object. Input: ai.* + ctx + req. Output: parsed fields + analysis_meta.* + ctx + req. WHY: structure for DB update

nodes.name: DB — Update Document
nodes.notes: Update content.documents with description+transcript in text, meta with analysis_meta (as OBJECT not string), status=completed. Input: parsed AI + ctx. Output: db update result. WHY update op: write results. WHY AOD=OFF

nodes.name: Merge — Restore CTX after Update
nodes.notes: Restore ctx/req/analysis after DB Update (Carry C1). Input1: DB result, Input2: parsed AI from Set. Output: db.update + parsed + ctx + req. WHY: preserve analysis for response

nodes.name: ERR — Source DB Update
nodes.notes: Capture error source for DB Update failure. Input: DB error. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + error. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve DB error details

nodes.name: ERR — Prepare ErrorPipe v1 (DB Upd)
nodes.notes: Build error_context for DB Update failure (retryable DB error). Input: err source. Output: error_context.*. WHY includeOtherFields=false: clean envelope

nodes.name: Execute WF99 (DB Upd)
nodes.notes: Call WF99 for DB Update failure. Input: error_context. Output: ErrorEnvelope. WHY: ErrorPipe v1

nodes.name: Set — Success Envelope
nodes.notes: Build SuccessEnvelope: ok=true, status_code=200, ctx, data (document_id, description, transcript, meta). Input: merged update + parsed. Output: SuccessEnvelope. WHY: WF42 contract

nodes.name: Manual Trigger TEST
nodes.notes: Test branch: creates fixture document + blob_object, runs workflow, verifies results, cleanup. Use for QA before deploy. WHY: real DB tests per project rules

nodes.name: Set — Test Config
nodes.notes: Configure test: tenant_id, storage_url (REPLACE with real S3 key in your env), mime_type, media_kind. Input: trigger. Output: test_config.*. WHY: user-editable test params

nodes.name: TEST — DB Insert Document Fixture
nodes.notes: Create test document row (title=WF42_TEST). Input: test_config. Output: db.document.id. WHY: fixture for test execution. WHY outputColumns: get new document_id

nodes.name: TEST — Merge Config with Document ID
nodes.notes: Merge test_config + new document_id. Input1: DB insert (document_id), Input2: test_config. Output: test_config.* + document_id. WHY: build test req payload

nodes.name: TEST — Build Req/Ctx
nodes.notes: Build test req/ctx matching WF90 input contract. Input: merged config + document_id. Output: req.* + ctx.*. WHY: simulate WF90 call to main workflow

nodes.name: TEST — DB Verify Updated Document
nodes.notes: Verify document was updated: select by document_id + title=WF42_TEST. Input: SuccessEnvelope (document_id). Output: db row. WHY: confirm text/meta/status updated correctly

nodes.name: TEST — DB Cleanup
nodes.notes: Delete test document WHERE id=verified_id AND title=WF42_TEST (safety: no prod rows deleted). Input: verified row. Output: delete result. WHY: test cleanup per rules

nodes.name: Set — Test Config1
nodes.notes: Configure test: tenant_id, storage_url (REPLACE with real S3 key in your env), mime_type, media_kind. Input: trigger. Output: test_config.*. WHY: user-editable test params

nodes.name: Set — Test Config2
nodes.notes: Configure test: tenant_id, storage_url (REPLACE with real S3 key in your env), mime_type, media_kind. Input: trigger. Output: test_config.*. WHY: user-editable test params

The first character must be { and the last character must be }
Analyze the audio and return ONLY this JSON object with exactly these keys:
{"description":"...","transcription":"...","language":"..."}
Rules:
No extra keys, no comments.
description: a detailed description of what happens in the audio, avoid using the " character inside the text (use ' or curly quotes “ ” if needed).
transcription: verbatim speech in windows encoding; if no speech, ""
language: ISO 639-1 code when possible, else "und"

nodes.name: Set — Test Config3
nodes.notes: Configure test: tenant_id, storage_url (REPLACE with real S3 key in your env), mime_type, media_kind. Input: trigger. Output: test_config.*. WHY: user-editable test params

nodes.name: ERR — Source AI Document
nodes.notes: Capture error source for AI Image analysis failure. Input: AI error. Output: _err.* + ctx + req + error. WHY includeOtherFields=true: preserve AI error details

parameters.text:
You are a strict JSON generator. Output ONLY one valid JSON OBJECT.
Do NOT wrap the JSON in quotes. Do NOT use markdown/code fences.
The first character must be { and the last character must be }
Analyze the document and return ONLY this JSON object with exactly these keys:
{"description":"...","transcription":"...","language":"..."}
Rules:
No extra keys, no comments.
description: a detailed description of what is in the document, avoid using the " character inside the text (use ' or curly quotes “ ” if needed).
transcription: verbatim text in windows encoding, if present in the document; if no text, ""
language: a language used in the document, ISO 639-1 code when possible, else "und"

nodes.name: Merge — Restore CTX after AI
nodes.notes: Restore ctx/req/media_kind after AI Video analysis (Carry C1). Input1: AI result, Input2: ctx from Is Video. Output: ai.* + media_kind + ctx + req. WHY: preserve context

main.node: Merge — Restore CTX after DB Select
Merge — Restore CTX after DB Select
TEST — Merge Config with Document ID
TEST — Merge Config with Document ID
